00092 typedef struct __orxCOMMAND_VAR_t
00093 {
00094   union
00095   {
00096     orxVECTOR           vValue;                       
00097     const orxSTRING     zValue;                       
00098     orxU32              u32Value;                     
00099     orxS32              s32Value;                     
00100     orxU64              u64Value;                     
00101     orxS64              s64Value;                     
00102     orxFLOAT            fValue;                       
00103     orxBOOL             bValue;                       
00104   };
00105 
00106   orxCOMMAND_VAR_TYPE   eType;                        
00108 } orxCOMMAND_VAR;

00111 typedef void (orxFASTCALL *orxCOMMAND_FUNCTION)(orxU32 _u32ArgNumber, const orxCOMMAND_VAR *_astArgList, orxCOMMAND_VAR *_pstResult);

00116 #define orxCOMMAND_REGISTER_CORE_COMMAND_NO_PARAM(MODULE, COMMAND, RESULT_NAME, RESULT_TYPE)                        \
00117 do                                                                                                                  \
00118 {                                                                                                                   \
00119   orxCOMMAND_VAR_DEF  stResult;                                                                                     \
00120   orxSTATUS           eStatus;                                                                                      \
00121   stResult.eType  = RESULT_TYPE;                                                                                    \
00122   stResult.zName  = RESULT_NAME;                                                                                    \
00123   eStatus         = orxCommand_Register(#MODULE"."#COMMAND, orx##MODULE##_Command##COMMAND, 0, 0, orxNULL, &stResult); \
00124   orxASSERT(eStatus != orxSTATUS_FAILURE);                                                                          \
00125 } while(orxFALSE)
00126 
00127 #define orxCOMMAND_REGISTER_CORE_COMMAND(MODULE, COMMAND, RESULT_NAME, RESULT_TYPE, REQ_PARAM_NUMBER, OPT_PARAM_NUMBER, ...)        \
00128 do                                                                                                                                  \
00129 {                                                                                                                                   \
00130   orxCOMMAND_VAR_DEF  stResult;                                                                                                     \
00131   orxCOMMAND_VAR_DEF  astParamList[REQ_PARAM_NUMBER + OPT_PARAM_NUMBER] = {__VA_ARGS__};                                            \
00132   orxSTATUS           eStatus;                                                                                                      \
00133   stResult.eType  = RESULT_TYPE;                                                                                                    \
00134   stResult.zName  = RESULT_NAME;                                                                                                    \
00135   eStatus         = orxCommand_Register(#MODULE"."#COMMAND, orx##MODULE##_Command##COMMAND, REQ_PARAM_NUMBER, OPT_PARAM_NUMBER, astParamList, &stResult); \
00136   orxASSERT(eStatus != orxSTATUS_FAILURE);                                                                                          \
00137 } while(orxFALSE)
